metadata.description:
“My California” is an indie rock/singer songwriter ode to being fallen out of love with; To being tossed aside, to that feeling of helplessness when an abrupt end falls into your lap. Joffe states: “My partner and I had planned a trip to California, but as our relationship began falling apart, the entire state of California was overridden with the tragedy of the wildfires. My sister lived there at the time, and I remember trying to convince her to get out before it got too bad, while simultaneously mourning the romantic trip I had planned with my partner and everything that loss symbolized.”

“My California” falls somewhere between the first 2 stages of grief in a relationship: denial and anger. With this release, Joffe has uniquely brought in the emotion that comes with gay break ups to mainstream culture. It is not only liberating but intends to give many the power back that can be lost in a relationship.

“I hope it does the same for anyone else who has watched someone fall out of love with them. "

lyrics.text:
[Chorus]
We were supposed to go to California
Then everything caught on fire
You disappeared without a warning
Yeah, just like the last you're a liar
You spilled wine on the couch
Now I can't wash you out just like you stuck
You stained my self-doubt
You're my California
But you burned down

[Verse 1]
Went through your drawers and read a letter about some other girl
Then watched the tv showing all the Redwoods burn
The world flashed orange and all eyes were on you
Wish I'd known in July the sky would nеver be as blue

[Chorus]
Wе were supposed to go to California
Then everything caught on fire
You disappeared without a warning
Yeah, just like the last you're a liar
You spilled wine on the couch
Now I can't wash you out just like you stuck
You stained my self-doubt
You're my California
But you burned down


[Verse 2]
I know it feels impossibly hard
But remember how soft I was lying next to you
Now, the smoke has left
We can catch our breath
So let's book a flight

[Chorus]
We were supposed to go to California
Then everything caught on fire
You disappeared without a warning
Yeah, you're a fucking liar
We drank wine on the couch
Then you spit me out
Now I'm stuck with this stain on my self-doubt
You're my California
But you burned down

[Outro]
You were my California
But you burned us to the ground
Yeah, you burned us to the ground

metadata.name: My California #1
metadata.title: My California
